verses.text:
Arise, my soul, arise! Stretch forth to things eternal
And hasten to the feet of your Redeemer God.
Though hid from mortal eyes, He dwells in light supernal;
Yet here He grants a foretaste of the feast to come!
Rejoice, my soul, rejoice, To Him be everlasting power and victory.
Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!

Now hear the harps of heaven! Oh, hear the song victorious,
The never-ending anthem sound through the sky!
To mortals is not given To join in strains so glorious;
Yet here on earth we too can sing our praises high!
He bought with His blood The ransomed of God;
And let the great Amen Resound through heaven's lift up your voice:
Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!
